meanings.definition: To create a representation or imitation of something.
meanings.sent1: She modelled a clay figure in art class.
meanings.sent2: The architect modelled the new building after a famous landmark.
meanings.sent3: The child modelled a toy car out of playdough.
meanings.sent4: Her painting modelled the beauty of nature in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: He carefully modelled the sculpture to capture every detail.

meanings.definition: To serve as a model or example for others.
meanings.sent1: The teacher modelled how to solve the math problem on the board.
meanings.sent2: His hard work and dedication modelled success for his peers.
meanings.sent3: The cat modelled how to relax in the sun all day.
meanings.sent4: The leader modelled integrity and honesty in all his actions.
meanings.sent5: She modelled kindness and compassion towards everyone she met.
